mapper.insert: insert into post(user_id, title, content, category, type) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{type});
mapper.select: select p.post_id, p.user_id, u.user_name, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.category, p.type, p.views from post p inner join user u on p.user_id = u.user_id order by post_id desc limit #{pageRowCount} offset #{offset}
select p.post_id, p.user_id, u.user_name, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.category, p.type, p.views from post p inner join user u on p.user_id = u.user_id where post_id = #{postId}
